div.h3: Reviews created for v_dashm for sprint Derry 2
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-6304: Add Evidence Status (EvidenceResultType) field to SelectedLeavePlan entity
FAB-6285: Revert the changes made related to automatic Task creation with description when Protocol exists with one Decision day is allowed
FAB-6285: Automatic Task creation with description when Protocol exists with one Decision day is allowed
FAB-6330: Application crashes when Click on Apply button in Manage Time with no Decision Day are selected
FAB-6225 : Partially Met plans cannot be progressed?
FAB-6311: Status to be N/A when No Evidence needed
FAB-6309: Overall Evidence status defaults to PLEASE_SELECT (displayed as N/A).
